mapper.insert: insert into member( member_no, member_name, member_id, member_password, member_email ) values ( seq_member_member_no.nextval, #{memberName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberPassword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, member_password as memberPassword, member_name as memberName, member_email as memberEmail, member_mpoint as memberMasterPoint, member_rpoint as memberReportPoint, member_spoint as memberStopPoint, member_flag as memberFlag, member_last_login as memberLastLogin, authority from member where member_id = #{memberName , jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from member where member_id = #{memberId , jdbcType=VARCHAR} and member_email = #{memberEmail , jdbcType=VARCHAR}
